name: Eric Lofholm
what_you_do: Eric Lofholm International is an organization dedicated to professionally training people on the art and science of selling, helping them achieve exceptional sales results.
who_you_serve: Sales professionals, coaches, entrepreneurs, and business owners
social_proof: 25 years in commissioned sales, made over 10,000 sales, 20+ years professionally training salespeople, trained over 10,000 sales professionals & businesses, made over 100,000 cold calls, author of 15 books, led over 1,000 training webinars and conferences, created over 100 sales training videos
signature_programs: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Trainer Program, Coaching Breakthrough, Corporate Training
business_focus: Helping business owners, entrepreneurs, and sales professionals successfully increase their sales performance
service_provided: Sales training, sales coaching, corporate training
